title: Here Are Five Totally Random Bike Events I Want to Do in 2025
content:
From a 10 day tour in Michigan's Upper Peninsula to a fringey ultra-endurance race from LA to Vegas, I just want to ride my bike in cool places with good people.

Read the full article at Here Are Five Totally Random Bike Events I Want to Do in 2025 on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
